E-learning-description: E-learning is a learning process that takes place via the Internet and with the support of technological tools. In this model, education has a totally virtual learning environment, in which instructors make content available and students access it from any computer or mobile device.
B-learning-description: Blended learning refers to the combination of face-to-face work and online work, where the student can control some factors such as the place, time and workspace.
Face-to-Face-description: Face-to-face education is the basic learning structure that requires and includes the necessary presence of a teacher and students in a classroom. The teacher is in charge of directing the training session, transmitting their knowledge, ideas and experiences related to the central theme.

When two factor authentication is enable: When two factor authentication is enabled, you will be prompted for a secure, random token during authentication. You may retrieve this token from your phone's Google Authenticator application.

Store these recovery codes in a secure p: Store these recovery codes in a secure password manager. They can be used to recover access to your account if your two factor authentication device is lost.

Once your account is deleted, all of its: Once your account is deleted, all of its resources and data will be permanently deleted. Before deleting your account, please download any data or information that you wish to retain.

Capacítate has wonderful and comprehensi: Capacítate has wonderful and comprehensive documentation that covers all aspects of the system. Whether you're new to using the platform or have previous experience, we encourage you to read the entire documentation cover to cover.
Capacítate offers a wide range of free c: Capacítate offers a wide range of free courses, with or without accompaniment, so that you can acquire the necessary skills and abilities for your professional development, improve productivity or enter the labor market. Take a look and see for yourself.
The learning paths are made up of a sequ: The learning paths are made up of a sequence of modules that will help you develop certain skills. Each student can choose the best guided teaching option that best suits their needs. The route you choose will be a different path, but you will receive the same knowledge.
